A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing culmination of legacy storytelling.  Subverted expectations in an unenjoyable way\, deeply flawed\, morose\, and antithetical to the saga put forth previously.  Not worh you time and money\, ruins any anticipation of seeing where things go from here.  Damages the brand as a whole.  A giant unerasable stain of a film.
